messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

select minds issues select minds issues dear writing we have several questions regarding our platform we have also noticed some issues with platform links career section we had links one link career section second one since we use anymore can we have links please accounts for employees what process for creating accounts select minds for employees should have accounts created automatically or every employee should raise ticket have created expired jobs list there several jobs still appear job list select minds but already filled please attachments those roles posted anymore seems we have received referral for job was filled july however cannot be found please review locations list total mess for instance there options for same for also appears twice if log recruiter have other options for location cannot upload candidate resume after attaching receive message please provide your resume even though already provided format our colleagues have issue we have advised them raise ticket but issue solved for months because we still receive recommendations via gets difficult track them also makes tool useless please let know if you need additional details we should solve issues possible discourage our colleagues using tool making referrals thank you

I'm analyzing the provided IT ticket description, specifically looking for themes related to platform functionality, user accounts, and outdated information. My goal is to map these observations to the predefined categories within the JSON schema.

I'm now focusing on pinpointing the core domain of the IT ticket. My analysis suggests the issues, ranging from platform link errors to resume upload failures and job listing discrepancies, all directly impact HR processes and the functionality of an HR-related platform. This points strongly towards "HR Support" as the most fitting classification.

**Identifying HR Domain**

I'm currently analyzing the provided IT ticket. My focus has shifted to discerning the core domain of the reported issues, which consistently revolve around platform functionality related to employee accounts, job listings, and candidate resume uploads.
